mapper.select: select count(*) from ope_production_parts_draft draft where draft.dr = 0

sql.if: and ( draft.parts_no like concat ("%",#{enter.keyword},"%") or draft.cn_name like concat ("%",#{enter.keyword},"%") or draft.en_name like concat ("%",#{enter.keyword},"%") )

mapper.select:
select draft.id, draft.parts_no, draft.parts_sec, sec.name as partsSecName, draft.parts_type, draft.sn_class, draft.id_calss, draft.parts_is_assembly, draft.parts_is_for_assembly, draft.cn_name, draft.en_name, draft.fr_name, draft.procurement_cycle, draft.dwg as dwgUrl, draft.supplier_id, supplier.supplier_name, draft.id_calss from ope_production_parts_draft draft left join ope_parts_sec sec on draft.parts_sec = sec.id left join ope_supplier supplier on draft.supplier_id = supplier.id where draft.dr = 0
order by draft.created_time desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}
